message: I 'll only be there for a few hours on Saturday morning. Was thinking of sprinting on Sentry (using it extensively) or Django. Since I 'll only stay for a few hours I think I 'll go with Django in order to just get some hands on in contributing so I can continue after Europython.
@pagles Cool, I'm going to be sprinting on Django too.
For the sprinters, you should sign up to a project here if you've not already: http://ep2011.europython.eu/p3/sprints/
I'm leaving on Saturday afternoon, not sure I'll get much stuff done at the sprints :/
@brutasse I 'm also leaving early in the afternoon. I think that I 'll just have time to check out the process of contributing, get some hints and be able to contribute after Europython.
